game.name: Interstellar Holy Spirit
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, Co-op, Online Co-op, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A multiplayer cooperative horror adventure game with an interstellar theme that can be played by 1-6 players! Players need to complete the tasks displayed on the screen of each level individually or collaboratively within a limited time and pass the Interstellar gate.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A multiplayer cooperative horror adventure game with an interstellar theme that can be played by 1-6 players! Players need to complete the tasks displayed on the screen of each level individually or collaboratively within a limited time and pass the Interstellar gate.
